short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlights version numbers in the Octopus Deploy dashboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For use with Octopus Deploy. From your dashboard, click the extension icon to highlight your version numbers. This makes it super-easy to see how your versions are progressing through your various deployment environments.
